title: Capture high-quality screenshots for launch
description: Take polished screenshots of all key features: Timeline view with colorful tasks, Kanban board with drag-and-drop, Dashboard with stats, Task detail page, Branch initialization flow, and Branch switcher breadcrumb. Ensure good demo data is visible.

acceptance_criteria.description: Timeline view screenshot (hero shot with 8-10 tasks, different colors)
Kanban board screenshot showing all columns with tasks
Dashboard screenshot with populated stats cards
Task detail page showing acceptance criteria and progress
